![](img/rcc_gif.gif)

We're a bi-weekly open coding café for anyone working at Steno Aarhus (SDCA), Dept. of Endocrinology (HoK), AU-Public Health, AU-Clinical Medicine and AU-Biomedicine to come and get help with their code.

## Format

Below are the planned dates; you can arrive and leave at any time. 

::: {.button-center}
[Add to my calendar](webcal://r-coding-cafe.zheer.dk/r-coding-cafe.ics){.btn .btn-outline-primary .btn role="button" data-toggle="tooltip" title="Automatically updated upon changes."}
:::

There will be a ~15 minute presentation at the beginning, tackling a relevant topic (a general R concept, specific packages and workflows that are nice to know, etc.)

Subsequently, 1-2 experienced instructors will help with your specific challenges and questions. But pelase interact with each other—maybe someone in the group has the solution to your exact problem.

::: {.callout-tip collapse="true" appearance="simple"}
## Prerequisites

You're expected to have an introductory knowledge of R and RStudio; consider 

- a course such as <a href="https://r-cubed-intro.rostools.org/">this</a> offered by the Danish Diabetes and Endocrinology Academy
- an online course such as <a href="https://www.datacamp.com/courses/free-introduction-to-r">this one at Datacamp.com</a>
- the fantastic online book <a href="https://r4ds.hadley.nz/intro.html">R for Data Science</a>

:::

```{r}
#| echo: false
```

### Other planned themes are:

- Nice to know packages (e.g., `{gtsummary}`, `{Epi}`, and `{Hmisc}`)
- Matching and Weighting (using `{MatchIt}` and `{WeightIt}` packages)
- Missing data: packages for working with them, including imputation via {mice} and combining this with `{MatchThem}`/`{WeightThem}`
- Preregistration as a means to improved workflows in R

Reach out to me if you want anything added to the list.

```{r}
create_event <- function(start, end, date, description, location) {
  reps <- length(start)
  events <- sprintf(
    "BEGIN:VEVENT
UID:%s@%s
DTSTAMP:%s
DTSTART:%s
DTEND:%s
STATUS:CONFIRMED
SUMMARY:R Coding Café
URL:r-coding-cafe.zheer.dk
DESCRIPTION:Topic: %s
LOCATION:%s
END:VEVENT", 
    uuid::UUIDgenerate(n = reps),rep("r-coding-cafe", reps), 
    Sys.time() |> format("%Y%m%dT%H%M%SZ", tz="Europe/Copenhagen") |> rep(reps),
    start |> format("%Y%m%dT%H%M%SZ", tz = "Europe/Copenhagen"),
    end |> format("%Y%m%dT%H%M%SZ", tz = "Europe/Copenhagen"),
    description,
    #paste0("\"", location, "\"")
    location
) |> paste0(collapse="\n")
  paste0("BEGIN:VCALENDAR
VERSION:2.0
PRODID:-//rstats//NONSGML v1.0//EN
CALSCALE:GREGORIAN
METHOD:PUBLISH
",
  events,
"
END:VCALENDAR")
}

with(timeline_raw, create_event(T_start, T_end, Date, Topic, Location)) |>
  writeLines("r-coding-cafe.ics")
```
